actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue code of 1986 to prohibit the retroactive application of Treasury Department regulations and rulings.

summary.text: Taxpayer Regulatory Relief Act of 1990 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the authority of the Secretary of the Treasury to prescribe the extent to which rules and regulations may be applied without retroactive effect (or with it). Requires all final, temporary, or proposed regulations and rulings issued by the Secretary to apply prospectively from the date of publication in the Federal Register, unless the Congress supersedes such treatment.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue code of 1986 to prohibit the retroactive application of Treasury Department regulations and rulings.
